sentences.title: Lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Lung cancer, also called lung carcinoma, is a malignant tumor that originates in the tissues of the lungs.

sentences.title: Lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Lung cancer is caused by genetic damage to the DNA of cells in the airways, often caused by cigarette smoking or inhaling damaging chemicals.

sentences.title: Lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Damaged airway cells gain the ability to multiply unchecked, causing the growth of a tumor.

sentences.title: Lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Without treatment, tumors spread throughout the lung, damaging lung function.

sentences.title: Lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Eventually lung tumors metastasize, spreading to other parts of the body.

sentences.title: Lung nodule
sentences.sentence_text: A lung nodule or pulmonary nodule is a relatively small focal density in the lung.

sentences.title: Lung nodule
sentences.sentence_text: A solitary pulmonary nodule (SPN) or coin lesion, is a mass in the lung smaller than three centimeters in diameter.

sentences.title: Lung nodule
sentences.sentence_text: A pulmonary micronodule has a diameter of less than three millimetres.

sentences.title: Lung nodule
sentences.sentence_text: There may also be multiple nodules.

sentences.title: Cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Cancer is a group of diseases involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body.

sentences.title: Cancer
sentences.sentence_text: These contrast with benign tumors, which do not spread.

sentences.title: Cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Possible signs and symptoms of cancer include a lump, abnormal bleeding, prolonged cough, unexplained weight loss, and a change in bowel movements.

sentences.title: Cancer
sentences.sentence_text: While these symptoms may indicate cancer, they can also have other causes.

sentences.title: Cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Over 100 types of cancers affect humans.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: A lung cavity or pulmonary cavity is an abnormal, thick-walled, air-filled space within the lung.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: Cavities in the lung can be caused by infections, cancer, autoimmune conditions, trauma, congenital defects, or pulmonary embolism.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: The most common cause of a single lung cavity is lung cancer.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: Bacterial, mycobacterial, and fungal infections are common causes of lung cavities.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: Globally, tuberculosis is likely the most common infectious cause of lung cavities.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: Less commonly, parasitic infections can cause cavities.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: Viral infections almost never cause cavities.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: The terms cavity and cyst are frequently used interchangeably; however, a cavity is thick walled, while a cyst is thin walled.

sentences.title: Lung cavity
sentences.sentence_text: The distinction is important because cystic lesions are unlikely to be cancer, while cavitary lesions are often caused by cancer.

sentences.title: Smoking cessation
sentences.sentence_text: Smoking cessation, usually called quitting smoking or stopping smoking, is the process of discontinuing tobacco smoking.

sentences.title: Smoking cessation
sentences.sentence_text: Tobacco smoke contains nicotine, which is addictive and can cause dependence.

sentences.title: Smoking cessation
sentences.sentence_text: As a result, nicotine withdrawal often makes the process of quitting difficult.

sentences.title: Smoking
sentences.sentence_text: Smoking is a human behavior which involves the combustion of a substance, usually plant material, and the inhalation of resulting fumes.

sentences.title: Smoking
sentences.sentence_text: Today, smoking is mostly practiced by rolling the dried leaves of the tobacco plant into a cigarette.

sentences.title: Smoking
sentences.sentence_text: Other forms of tobacco smoking include the use of a smoking tobacco with a pipe or cigar, or using a bong.

sentences.title: Smoking
sentences.sentence_text: Cigarette smokers almost always inhale the smoke; most pipe and cigar smokers do not inhale.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: The lungs are the primary organs of the respiratory system in many animals, including humans.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: In mammals and most other tetrapods, two lungs are located near the backbone on either side of the heart.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: Their function in the respiratory system is to extract oxygen from the atmosphere and transfer it into the bloodstream, and to release carbon dioxide from the bloodstream into the atmosphere, in a process of gas exchange.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: Respiration is driven by different muscular systems in different species.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: Mammals, reptiles and birds use their musculoskeletal systems to support and foster breathing.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: In early tetrapods, air was driven into the lungs by the pharyngeal muscles via buccal pumping, a mechanism still seen in amphibians.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: In humans, the primary muscle that drives breathing is the diaphragm.

sentences.title: Lung
sentences.sentence_text: The lungs also provide airflow that makes vocalisation including speech possible.

sentences.title: Treatment of lung cancer
sentences.sentence_text: Treatment of lung cancer refers to the use of medical therapies, such as surgery, radiation, chemotherapy, immunotherapy, percutaneous ablation, and palliative care, alone or in combination, in an attempt to cure or lessen the adverse impact of malignant neoplasms originating in lung tissue.

sentences.title: Lung surgery
sentences.sentence_text: Lung surgery is a type of thoracic surgery involving the repair or removal of lung tissue, and can be used to treat a variety of conditions ranging from lung cancer to pulmonary hypertension.

sentences.title: Lung surgery
sentences.sentence_text: Common operations include anatomic and nonanatomic resections, pleurodesis and lung transplants.

sentences.title: Lung surgery
sentences.sentence_text: Though records of lung surgery date back to the Classical Age, new techniques such as VATS continue to be developed.

sentences.title: Chance
sentences.sentence_text: Chance may refer to:

sentences.title: Think smoking only harms the lungs? What a US-based gastroenterologist wants you to know
sentences.sentence_text: Smoking is commonly associated with lung damage, but its impact goes far beyond that.

sentences.title: Think smoking only harms the lungs? What a US-based gastroenterologist wants you to know
sentences.sentence_text: A US-based gastroenterologist sheds light on the lesser-known ways smoking affects the body, interferes with healing, and quietly contributes to health problems over time.

sentences.title: Breaking the link between smoking and lung cancer: Support for prevention and pain relief
sentences.sentence_text: As the weather turns colder, many people notice their breathing feels a little heavier and chest discomfort rises.

sentences.title: Breaking the link between smoking and lung cancer: Support for prevention and pain relief
sentences.sentence_text: For people with smoking habits, these seasonal changes can make the already existing symptoms even harder.

sentences.title: Breaking the link between smoking and lung cancer: Support for prevention and pain relief
sentences.sentence_text: As irritation increases, cough worsens, and the lungs struggle more.

sentences.title: Breaking the link between smoking and lung cancer: Support for prevention and pain relief
sentences.sentence_text: These factors make the colder months an important time for them to focus more on lung health.

sentences.title: Wiz Khalifa sentenced to nine months in prison in Romania after smoking cannabis at 2024 music festival
sentences.sentence_text: Wiz Khalifa was sentenced by a court in Romania on Thursday to nine months in jail for drug possession after taking part in a music festival last year in the Eastern European country.

sentences.title: Wiz Khalifa sentenced to nine months jail in Romania
sentences.sentence_text: The rapper, who has been sentenced in absentia, had admitted to smoking a cannabis joint on stage at a festival last year.

sentences.title: TB prevention and cure
sentences.sentence_text: AS a director of the Philippine Tuberculosis Society, Inc. (PTSI), my advocacy extends beyond treating TB — it must also confront one of the strongest drivers of the disease: smoking in all its forms, including vaping.

sentences.title: Down Arrow Button Icon
sentences.sentence_text: In 2023, then Surgeon General Vivek Murthy reported on an “epidemic of loneliness and isolation,” similar to previous advisories on smoking and obesity.

sentences.title: Did you know smoking injures the stomach? Florida gastroenterologist shares 3 common ‘gut toxins’ you should avoid
sentences.sentence_text: Daily activities like smoking and painkiller use can silently injure your stomach lining, negatively impacting gut health.

sentences.title: Did you know smoking injures the stomach? Florida gastroenterologist shares 3 common ‘gut toxins’ you should avoid
sentences.sentence_text: Dr Salhab shares 3 such “gut toxins.” | Health

sentences.title: ‘Hard work, no smoking and no drinking’: Ireland’s oldest person celebrates 109th birthday
sentences.sentence_text: Eileen Hynes has lived through War of Independence, Civil War, 10 papacies and 20 US presidencies

sentences.title: 'I’m A Railway Employee, Do Whatever You Want': 'Arrogant' Man Smokes Inside Train, Sparks Outrage | VIDEO
sentences.sentence_text: A viral video showing a man allegedly smoking inside a train and claiming to be a railway employee has triggered widespread outrage on social media., Viral, Times Now

sentences.title: Think smoking only harms your lungs? It may be destroying your vision too
sentences.sentence_text: Smoking and vaping don’t just harm the heart and lungs—they also increase the risk of affecting your vision
